div.p: These pages contain HL7's recorded metadata information for external terminologies which is published in the HL7 Terminology pages. These are not the actual code system instances, they are only noted information about these code systems (sometimes referred to as 'stubs').

The lists of content here is maintained by HL7 through the Unified Terminology Governance (UTG) process, and is published by HL7 in the different HL7 product families. Updates and and maintenance in UTG is a continuous process, and the content available here is updated frequently.
div.b: HL7 Terminology Authority (HTA) managed code system metadata records
Code system metadata records not managed by the HTA
